Text.Page:
Mission Orders

Enemies have seized the Croskurn Mines.

Destroy the Desert Scourge {@LinkCreature:35#5#crushers}, {@LinkCreature:35#6#manglers}, {@LinkCreature:35#2#choppers}, {@LinkCreature:35#1#scouts}, and {@LinkCreature:35#4#reapers}, as well as {@LinkCreature:35#14#vulcan raiders}.

Report to Slevene when mission is complete.
You've earned the thanks of the federation. Your guild is an inspiration to all!
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
